JobFullDesc: Be a part of Advanced Technology captures!Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD) has an opening for a Principal Specialist, Contracts OR Mgr., Contracts within RMD’s Advanced Technology organization, which focuses on key pursuits as well as development efforts that serve as the growth engine and front of the business, critical to the future growth of RMD. The individual in this role will be part of a team of Contracts professionals supporting the Advanced Air Warfare Systems (AAWS), Advanced Enabling Technology (AET), and Integrated Kill Chain Architecture (IKCA) portfolios of programs, including competitive pursuits. The individual in this role will be the Contracts lead for the Miniature Self Defense Munition (MSDM) Phase 2 program and several proprietary efforts, as well as provide support to current captures including the Stand-In Attack Weapon (SiAW) Rapid Protoype Requirement.    This role includes analysis of Request for Proposals (RFP), proposal reviews and coordination, contract negotiation, estimate at completion (EAC) reviews, support of program management and execution reviews, Intellectual Property and investment strategy development, and general contract administration. Responsibilities include working closely with the Portfolio Directors, Program Managers, Chief Engineers, Business/Estimating, and Supply Chain to construct, submit and negotiate pricing proposals; providing guidance to senior management regarding contractual and business issues; ensuring that negotiated terms and conditions comply with company policies; advising management of contractual rights and obligations and possible mitigation of contractual/program risks.Please note that this role will be primarily on-site at RMD Tucson.
